item.title: Running Pi-hole on Kubernetes
item.description: Recently I wrote how you can install Kubernetes on Raspberry Pi. In this post, we will install Pi-Hole on Kubernetes. Up to recent versions of Pi-Hole Docker images you had to take care of the correct architecture (and as a result correct docker tag to use).
